title: memory corruption bugs
extract: The contents of a memory location are modified due to programming errors which enable attackers to execute an arbitrary code. Description: Memory corruption bugs mostly occur in low-level programming languages like C or C++. ... Stack overflows are by far the most commonly exploited class of memory corruption flaws.
extract_html: The contents of a memory location are modified due to programming errors which enable attackers to execute an arbitrary code. Description: Memory corruption bugs mostly occur in low-level programming languages like C or C++. ... Stack overflows are by far the most commonly exploited class of memory corruption flaws.
